title: Baby come back ;-;
body:
Now that my bestie left me i am forced to be a girl about it and vent to the public about nothing
here goes nothing....

So like we were in discord chatting away and she wanted to follow on the ye old instagram but I was like nah fam give it so time
then she dogged me and was mad at me pls tell me why...then I she was okay and added me to discord and then we talked but then i let randoms follow me and she triggered because i let randoms follow me and not her so like then we stop talking again

so people of the internet prey for me in the comments

definitely not whoring for likes and view.  

also you wasted allot of time reading this pointless stuff.

replies.body: Pretty sure there's a place to talk about social problems somewhere else, not on League forums...
